attributes.action: Tom Winsor to be reprimanded by Parliament - Inappropriate dress at Police Memorial
attributes.additional_details: Proposal that Tom Winsor be properly and publicly censured by Parliament & Home Office for his grossly offensive behaviour at the National Police Memorial Service in wearing a self-styled 'uniform' that mimics that of a Chief Police Officer, and caused distress and outrage amongst serving and retired officers, their families, and the families and loved ones of officers who gave their lives in the course of their duty.
